jColor.js
the javascript color picker, friendly, lightweight and easily

Demo

jColorDemo-color


        
    

var dom = document.getElementById('color');
new jColor(dom);

jColorDemo-range


        
    

var dom = document.getElementById('color');
new jColor(dom, {
    type: 'range'
});

jColorDemo - default color


var defaultColor = document.getElementById('defaultColor');
    new jColor(defaultColor, {
        value: [255, 255, 0, 0.5]
    });

jColorDemo - listen change



  
    

var listenChange = document.getElementById('listenChange');
var listenChangeText = document.getElementById('listenChange-text');

new jColor(listenChange, {
    change: function(color) {
        listenChangeText.textContent = color.toString();
    }
});

jColorDemo - choosed



      
    

var choosed = document.getElementById('choosed');
var choosedText = document.getElementById('choosed-text');

new jColor(choosed, {
    choosed: function(color) {
        choosedText.textContent = color.toString();
    }
});
